page.title: 18Games I Play
page.content: I like to play Hop Scotch with my friends. I like to play Bulldog and Chain Tig. I play Bulldog and Chain Tig with everyone in the school. Sometimes I play rounders with my class. I play Wally and Donkey. Sometimes I play Tig, High Tig and Sevenses. I play all these games outside. When you play rounders there are four bases. There are two teams. The two oldest pick the teams. The bowler bowls to the batsman who hits the ball as hard as he can and tries to run round all the bases before the fielders catch and return the ball to the bowler.
